title: 求1.3.1光影mod整合包
author: zeroro
txt_content: 我怎么找都找不到啊啊啊啊

replies.author: qqgk1105
replies.txt_content: 我也有发帖找，但是都不给，说：伸手党最讨厌什么的

replies.author: qqgk1105
replies.txt_content: 装过这个mod的把.minecraft/bin/里面的minecraft.jar发一下覆盖就能用了,可就没人帮个小忙

replies.author: zeroro
replies.txt_content: 嗯 嗯 恩 恩恩

replies.author: qqgk1105
replies.txt_content: http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... c-shadows-and-more/这是外国网站的1.3.的光影,我下载不了,给你们能顺便帮我传一下么244143443@qq.com

replies.author: zeroro
replies.txt_content: 哦~我来试试，能下下来的会传给你~

replies.author: zeroro
replies.txt_content: 我下下来了，是不是Shaders-Windows   和   Shaders-Jar    这两个，如果是 怎么用~{:10_522:}

replies.txt_content:
